name: Splash Wars
description:
Welcome to Splash Wars, a upcoming free-to-play team-based vehicular combat game unlike any other you have ever seen: paint the map with your own ink to win! Get your squad together and splash your way to victory!Awesome features include:
  • Find the perfect car for your playstyle: Try out all cars and find the one that matches your playstyle the most! Here’s a sneak peek at the types of cars you can play as:
    • Damage: Disrupt the enemy team by setting up traps or rush into combat with the most powerful and versatile arsenal for destruction.
    • Tank: Lead your team to victory with your incredible resistance and make sure no one can take over your painted zones.
    • Support: Help out your teammates with heals and buffs and control your opponents so that they can't take out your allies!
  • Physics-based: Drift, jump over ramps, overtake and perform epic maneuvers!
  • Paint to win: To win, all you have to do is paint more than the enemy team, but that's easier said than done. Each car has different weapons and is well equipped to handle different situations, so make sure to cooperate with your teammates to find the perfect strategy!
